REQ: Dreamfleet GA-727.exe [version 1.0; 115MB, NOT the one currently published on Flight1 site which is version 2.0 and is 195MB]

Just flew the scenery & the only thin I see missing is some jetways on the express side for the ERJ & CRJ.

They included the old tower on top of B & the new tower where I worked on top of the main concourse.

Many thanks to Kenyo for the fast response & a great job doing the rip.

Request PLEASE :

and FlyCaribe #11+ if available yet. 

THANX
